name: Play daily bonus game and verify Scratchpath scenarios.
id: stories/fp/miscellaneous/Scratchpath.story;Play daily bonus game and verify Scratchpath scenarios.

children.description: Maximize window

testSteps.description: Retrive the values from Scratchpath Redirect article

children.description: Go to FP application
Maximize window
Given Login to the Frontpage Admin
Login frontpage admin
And Do a search for an article 'Tokens / Bonus Scratchcard Completion'
Search article: Tokens / Bonus Scratchcard Completion
And Retrieve the description,notice,tokens,condition info from the article
Article info

testSteps.description: Given Login to the FP Application as recent user

children.description: Login to FP application as recent user
Navigate to FP application: {https://frontpage.qa.pch.com/?em=fpautomationuser.1c5329@pchmail.com&gmt=72e13e7f-f132-454c-a48f-597c69e47e80}
Click play b gicon

exception.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for presence of element located by: By.cssSelector: img.progress-bar-sticky__play-now (tried for 25 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)

children.description: Then Verify the application redirected to Scratchcard page
And Verify right rail ad '300','250'
And Verify inline ad '728','90'
And Verify right rail multiple ad '300','600','300','250'
And Play and verify scratchpath games
And Verify the application redirected to homepage instead of scratchcard page
And Verify the absence of play bonus game icon
And Navigate to Token History Page
And Verify token transaction details based on admin configured article 'tokens','description','1'
And Verify the play bonus game property on database '2'

userStory.narrative:
In order to verify scratchpath game
As a Tester
I want to retrive scratchcard article details from admin and read/watch articles and video in Frontpage site.
